job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtRoleltstronggt Site Reliability Engineer SREltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtAn award winningampnbspFortune 50 Energy Company striving towards cleaner energy solutions is looking for a Site Reliability Engineer to join their team on a contract to hire basis The Site Reliability Engineer will be responsible for the upkeep and improvement of DSX production systems The contract will be 6  12 months with the likelihood of becoming a full time roleltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtRoleResponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtSupport Service EngineersltligtltligtUpkeep and improve existing infrastructure and documentationltligtltligtInfrastructure AutomationltligtltligtImprove upon Prometheus MonitoringltligtltligtDeploy new versions of DSXltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtRequirementsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt3 Years Experience in a similar role preferredltligtltligtBachelors DegreeltligtltligtFamiliarity with Linux Unix Shell GithubltligtltligtTools Nginx Docker Kubernetes or TerraformltligtltligtLanguages Nodejs Python Go NET or RubyltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtCompensation and BenefitsltstronggtltpgtltpgtThe rate for this role isampnbsp7095 phampnbspwith some flexibility for exceptional circumstances We also offerampnbspmedical contributionsampnbspup to 75 ampampampnbsp401k plansltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtNo C2C candidatesltpgtltpgtMust be eligible to work in TXltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtCould this be of interest to you at this time If so please apply with an updated copy of your resume and feel free to followup with a call at 9295214926ltpgt
